pr_title: Alert API: Bulk Change Confidence or Risk - Fixes 5845

timeline.bodyText:
I'd suggest collect them first to ensure all IDs are valid before starting processing the alerts (while missing alert will also lead to partial updates it's one less thing).
This can also be extracted, something like:
updateAlerts(alert -> alert.setConfidence(confidenceId));
and let updateAlerts extract/loop the IDs and get/process the alerts.
timeline.author: thc202

replies.bodyText: For the second one, how would the signature/definition of the method look?
replies.author: kingthorin

replies.bodyText:
Right, left out the params... should be like:
void updateAlerts(JSONObject params, Consumer<Alert> consumer)
replies.author: thc202

timeline.author: thc202

timeline.message:
Alert API: Bulk Change Confidence or Risk - Fixes 5845

Added API actions to bulk update Confidence or Risk based on a CSV
string of alert IDs. Extracted some code to convenience methods which
also lead to minor modification of code within deleteAlert and addAlert
processing.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>
